name: ShrinkTheWeb Refresh All
author: Sabirul Mostofa

sections.description:
This plugin works with the Directorypress theme, WP-Portfolio plugin, and/or with the STW WordPress plugin.
It refreshes all the thumbnails at once with the option to schedule the refresh action in selected intervals or immmediately.
It also allows the users to clear the cache immediately.

Donate

Did this plugin get you out of trouble? Please consider making a small donation to thank the developer for their time.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the content of wp-random-quote.zip to a dedicated folder in your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin on the ‘Plugins’ page in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.3.2

  • Changed all ‘http://www.shrinktheweb.com’ links to ‘https://shrinktheweb.com’

1.3.1

  • Changed all ‘http://www.shrinktheweb.com’ links to ‘https://shrinktheweb.com’

1.3

  • Support to check image timestamps to ensure all images have been refreshed

1.2

  • Bug fix to support WP-Portfolio in cases where STW Plugin and DirectoryPress are not also installed

1.1

  • Now supports WP-Portfolio (for legacy installations that cannot be easily upgraded to new WP-Portfolio versions

1.0

  • Initial Release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the content of wp-random-quote.zip to a dedicated folder in your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin on the ‘Plugins’ page in WordPress.
